Common.Highlight.Common.Text: On-site amenities keep employees refreshed and productive
Abundant integral parking garage(s) under the buildings
Contemporary atriums include Carrera marble walls, and granite floors
Green space outside provides informal meeting space
Free courtesy shuttle service for tenants within Downtown area
Dedicated light-rail ('T') stop and multiple PAT bus stops provide transit connectivity

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Gateway Center is located in the heart of Pittsburgh's central business district near Market Square.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The 4-building, 1.5 million sq.ft. complex includes plazas with a sparkling fountain and towering trees, lush plants and blooming flowers with breezy walkways.  Recent lobby renovations include rich Italian Carrera marble walls, granite floors and shining steel with glass atriums.

Gateway Center offers fabulous views of PNC Park, Heinz Field, and Point State Park.  The Center also plays host to the Three Rivers Arts Festival.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 1.5 million SF office campus in the heart of Pittsburgh's central business district.
